function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disruption in the supply chain due to movement control and lockdown","Impact":"Delayed construction work, lack of materials, increased costs of relocation and cleaning","Mitigation":"Diversification of suppliers, demand forecasting, and inventory management","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems and predictive analytics","People":"Local construction industry, foreign workers, project contractors","Owner":"Construction industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Loss of finance due to running cost and wages while project jobs are halted","Impact":"Financial strain, halted income, increased project costs","Mitigation":"Emergency funding, cost-saving measures, renegotiation of contracts","Technologies":"Financial management software, budgeting tools","People":"Project contractors, construction company owners","Owner":"Project contractors, construction company owners"},{"Description":"Restriction on labor affecting productivity and work progress","Impact":"Drop in productivity, delayed work progress, exposure to liquidated damages","Mitigation":"Remote work solutions, workforce management strategies, renegotiation of project timelines","Technologies":"Project management software, remote collaboration tools","People":"Project contractors, construction workers","Owner":"Project contractors"}]}
